row.entry: HRESULT CreateGraphWindow([in] CMDIFrameWnd* ParentWnd, [in] short BusType)
This function is used to create Signal Graph Window for a particular bus.
ParentWnd – Parent window pointer. BusType – Associated bus with this current Signal Graph window.
HRESULT ShowGraphWindow([in] short BusType, [in] BOOL bShow = TRUE)
Shows or hides Signal Graph Window of a particular bus type.
BusType - The bus type. bShow – TRUE to show, FALSE to hide.
This function is used to get the visibility status of the window of a bus.
This function sets the refresh rate of Signal Graph Window.
Getter function for refresh rate of Signal Graph window.
This function returns interface of the common buffer / channel for the messages or frames of any bus supported.
The common buffer interface pointer if successful, else NULL.
A message entry is of the format: <BUS><Length of data bytes>
HRESULT SetSignalListDetails( [in] short BusType, [in] CGraphList * pSignalList)
This function is used to pass the selected set of distilled signal information which are necessary to display signal graphs for a particular bus.
BusType – The bus type. pSignalList - The configured signal data for a particular bus.
